body:
A gist of the installation log is at https://gist.github.com/goxberry/b9ca39f4d7c5cd6b0905aaaa42f53746

If I had to guess, the error at the end of the log re: the RPATH option `-rpath=$STUFF` is the problem; IIRC, that syntax works on GCC, but not with LLVM/clang. Replacing `-rpath=` with `-rpath,` (that is, replace the equals sign with a comma) should work for both GCC and LLVM/clang compilers.
title: metis 4.0.3 doesn't install on macOS 10.11.6 with appleclang 7.0.3
